info.name: fractalized Circuit Diagram2
info.description:
morphing fractals based on jarble's

original: "I edited [url=https://www.shadertoy.com/view/wtlyR8]ntsutae's "Circuit Diagram2" [/url] to make this animation. Surprisingly, it has several moving patterns that resemble "gliders" from cellular automata."
